name: Floating Floss VR (Oculus GO/Quest)
description:
The game is about staying within the peaceful flow of shearing fluffy sheep made of fairy floss and letting (or not letting) them float to the sky… until they become clouds and make rain one day.

  • 1. Fluffy sheep made of fairy floss grow wool that can be sheared.
  • 2. Overgrown sheep will float and become clouds.
  • 3. Too many clouds in the sky result in rain. Next day, all sheep in the farm disappears.

Do you have VR headset?

This game currently supports Oculus GO and Oculus Quest only. Other platforms are not tested. Compatible with Windows too, but some interaction will not work.

What you can do:

  • Shear wool from sheep
  • Make a new sheep (by putting sheared wool into the box next to ice cream bar)
  • Duplicate wool  (by putting sheared wool into the box next to house)
  • Pluck fairy floss leaves from trees
  • Eat edibles 
  • Feed sheep
  • Open mailbox
  • Make it rain (by stacking 30+ clouds)
  • Mess with clouds
  • (QUEST ONLY) Grab two things at the same time (e.g. Carrying multiple wool at once in a portable box)

This is a student project made @ SAE Brisbane, Australia.

If you're super keen, here's also a play-test questionnaire as well!

Link: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScOw_zOagRmoE90tYfE2b6ZMW7Nlz2clgC5eYTQS_0ldD2Xow/viewform

Any question, feedback, suggestion please email to : wldud5192@gmail.com

Music:
"Fluffing a duck" by Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
